00019 #define SCPM_H
00020 
00021 #include <string>
00022 #include <vector>
00023 #include <scpm_types.h>
00024 #include <scdb.h>
00025 
00026 class SCPM
00027 {
00028 public:
00029 
00030   SCPM( int options=0, ostream &info_out=cout, ostream &hash_out=cout );
00031   ~SCPM();
00032 
00033   bool Enable( );
00034   bool Disable( );
00035 
00036   bool Active( string &profile );
00037   bool List( vector<string> &profiles );
00038 
00039   bool Add( string profile, bool auto_switch=false );
00040   bool Copy( string source_profile, string profile );
00041   bool Create( string profile, string source_profile );
00042   bool Delete( string profile );
00043   bool Rename( string profile, string newprofile );
00044   bool Reload( );
00045   bool PrepareSwitch( string profile, switch_info_t &switch_info );
00046   bool Switch( switch_info_t &switch_info );
00047   bool Modify( string profile, string action );
00048   bool Set( string command, string argument, string profile="" );
00049   bool Get( string command, string &result, string profile="" );
00050   bool Save( switch_info_t &switch_info );
00051   bool Status( scpm_status_t &status );
00052 
00053   bool ShowChanges( ostream &output, string resource_type, string resource_name );
00054 
00055   bool SetResourceSet( string set );
00056   bool GetResourceSet( string &set );
00057   bool ListResourceSets( vector<string> &predefined, vector<string> &individual );
00058   bool CopyResourceSet( string set, string newset );
00059   bool DeleteResourceSet( string set );
00060 
00061   bool RebuildDB( );
00062 
00063 private:
00064 
00065 };
